definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Mothers-in-law hasten sons-in-law to buy houses, thus they may assure before their daughters getting married.
sentences.chinese: 丈母孃督促小女婿快點買房，這樣才放心嫁女兒。

sentences.english: Therefore the government must continue to prop up housing prices or provide incentives to encourage people to buy homes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，政府必須繼續推高房價或者激勵人們買房子。

sentences.english: Millions of middle-class Chinese have gambled on buying new apartments.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬的中國中產階級買房就像賭博。

sentences.english: Chengdu lift your apartment will be a multi-storey residential housing you choose?
sentences.chinese: 成都電梯公寓貴過多層住宅買房你將作何選擇？

sentences.english: The only challenge buyers face involves getting approved for a loan.
sentences.chinese: 買房人面臨的唯一挑戰是貸款能否獲批。

sentences.english: The two singles decided to buy a house and live together.
sentences.chinese: 兩位單身族決定買房，共同生活在一起。

sentences.english: Recent homebuyers would also find themselves out of pocket.
sentences.chinese: 最近的買房者也會覺得自己做了虧本生意。

sentences.english: You'd better send your certificate through registered post because it is safer.
sentences.chinese: 買房時不要忘了帶戶口本，這是很重要的證件。

sentences.english: You said you wanted to own a house upcountry , is this still your dream?
sentences.chinese: 你說過想在內地買房子，這個還是你的夢想嗎？

sentences.english: Chen Gua ambitions to buy a house and bashfully lets the left Yi companion him to watch creating together.
sentences.chinese: 沈括要買房，扭扭捏捏的讓左伊陪他一起去看房。

sentences.english: He did her down over selling the house.
For America's homebuyers, credit is certainly available.
sentences.chinese: 美國買房者獲得信貸肯定不成問題。

sentences.english: People in China joke that they had to start saving to buy a home in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 國人開玩笑說，他們想買房，要從唐朝就開始攢錢。

sentences.english: They stinted for years to buy their own house.
sentences.chinese: 他們省喫儉用有多年了，以便能節省下錢買房子。

sentences.english: They are now at such a high level that even white-collar workers cannot afford to buy apartments anymore.
sentences.chinese: 現在房價高到連白領階層都不能承擔買房的壓力了。

sentences.english: They took 1000 dollars for the house.

definition: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
to go to town/to enter a big city (to live or work)
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
